4918.verse: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.

4919.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4920.verse: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];

4921.verse: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.

4922.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4923.verse: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.

4924.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4925.verse: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.

4926.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4927.verse: Everyone upon the earth will perish,

4928.verse: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

4929.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4930.verse: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.

4931.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4932.verse: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.

4933.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4934.verse: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].

4935.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4936.verse: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.

4937.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

4938.verse: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -

4939.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

4940.verse: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.

4941.verse: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
